markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[True Hypercognition](/Feats.aspx?ID=4626) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Loremaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=65) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[enigma muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

Your mind works at an incredible pace. You instantly use up to five [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can’t use them for these actions.
name: True Hypercognition

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > True Hypercognition Single Action Source Player Core pg. 106 2.0 Archetype Loremaster (Level 16) Prerequisites enigma muse --- Your mind works at an incredible pace. You instantly use up to five Recall Knowledge actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can’t use them for these actions.
